ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {Cloud}
“What are you looking at?”

“…I'm not going to wake you up tomorrow.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Sephiroth
“I've hired a guide to the Mako reactor.”{PAUSE}“I've heard she's young,
I hope we can rely on her…”

dialogStrings:
Sephiroth
“…We have an early start tomorrow.
You should get some sleep soon.”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}It's still early.
{CHOICE}Yeah, let's get some sleep.
